lines.text: I don't want to sound like a fag or nothing, but you are my best friend.
I would fuck a cigarette lighter if my dick would fit!
What do you mean "if"?
Just what exactly does "eat my fuck" mean?
Beats me...

Most of you are going to go on to college. You're gonna be the people that change the world. Believe me, the world is changing. For example, Betsy. Betsy, you're going to major in computer science! Ed, Ed's gonna be an electrical engineer. And, er, Tom. Uh, oh, Tom, what were you again?
Modern dance.
His name is not Bob. All fucking year you've called him Bob. His name is Bob.
Bo.
Bo.
Hey, this camel jockey is ripping us off!
I've got stuff inside of me.
What, feel like cancer or something?
You remember Christmas? That guy smashing your car and taking off? You could do nothing about it.
I was so pissed off, man. I wanted to kill that guy.
That's how I feel all the time.
Hey, come on, man. You're righteously pissed off. Hell, you're like a lot of people.
I thought the Marines would get it out of my system.
All you're going to get out of the Marines is a bad haircut.
Poor bastard will be lucky if he remembers his name after the beating he got. Two bucks. Un-fucking-believable.
So *this* is the Tar Pits? Big wow.
Why isn't it bubbling and stuff? Steam and shit. Maybe there's some kind of show.
What a screwy job.
Well, our jobs are better.
What, the factory?
No, our jobs as fashion designers.
Hey, quit complaining. It's a good job. Manufacturing. It's American!

You sound like my dad. He's been going in and out of those shit box factories for thirty years. Always a week away from getting out. Alright, we start Monday but we don't get out in two months. Then it's six months. Then you wake up and it's thirty fucking years later.
They're what?
Anarchists, man. It means they'll fuck anything!
I just feel bad about that girl. I did not want to hurt her.
She didn't know what hit her. we gave her two seconds of pain. Girls like that one have given us eighteen years of pain.
Excuse me, where's the action around here?
Action? There is no action around here, this is L.A.
What's the note say?
Thanks... for... taking... up... two... parking... places, ass... hole.
Listen, Roy. There's a lot of tension in the air right now. Mercury's in retrograde. Venus is opposing Saturn. The moon's in Scorpio.
What has that to do with my car?
Well, if you know your place in the cosmos, the world is beautiful. Just think to yourself, the world is beautiful.
Fuck the world!
This stuff is all bullshit!
You know, you have very negative energy. It's going to prevent you getting anywhere in this life.
Two seconds of pain, Roy.
Why did you kill your friend?
Because I had to.
Fucking dykes really get off calling us fags.
All I wanted was some gas!

[to Bo after snapping Angie's neck and spiking her body to the ground]
You FUCKED that?
Alright. Party time. Party time, man.
You gave her a heart attack, man.
She was ready to die anyway.
